definition: غرس garasa i (gars) to plant, implant (في هـ s.th. in); to place, put, set, infix, interpose, interpolate, insert (في هـ s.th. into) IV to plant, implant (هـ s.th.) VII to be planted, be implanted; to sink in غرس gars planted; (pl. اغراس agrās, غراس girās) plant, layer, cion, nursery plant, seedling غرس girs pl. اغراس agrās plant, layer, cion, nursery plant, seedling
